# dates just before and just after the addition
# of leap seconds.  Leap second data was downloaed
# from
#
# http://maia.usno.navy.mil/ser7/tai-utc.dat
#
# on 2015 10 December
#
# TAI was calculated using the ERFA method eraUtcTai
# as provided by the erfa repository
#
# https://github.com/liberfa/erfa
#
# release v1.2.0
#
